sentences.sContent: When Wardell was interviewed, he was impressive, and on that basis, he was hired.
sentences.sCn: 当沃德尔接受面试时，他给人印象深刻，因此他被雇用了。

sentences.sContent: an interview for a job on the Los Angeles Times
sentences.sCn: 《洛杉矶时报》的一次求职面试

sentences.sContent: Elton John gave an interview to Barbara Walters (= he answered her questions ).
sentences.sCn: 埃尔顿 · 约翰接受了芭芭拉 · 沃尔特斯的采访。

synos.tran: 采访；接见；对…进行面谈；对某人进行面试

phrases.pCn: 个人面谈；面谈调查；私人的会谈
对顾客需要的深入查询
结构化面试；结构式访谈
n. （对考生进行的）口头审查；非结构化面试；非结构性面谈

words.tran: 会见者；面谈者；进行面试者

remMethod.val: inter(在…之间)+view(看)→在几个人之间相互观察→会见

trans.tranOther: to ask someone questions during an interview
a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc
